mapper.select: /* [memberMgmetDao.xml][select] 조건에 맞는 회원정보 가져오기 */ SELECT MEMBER_ID AS memberId, PASSWORD AS password, NICK_NAME AS nickName, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, BIRTH AS birth, CDV AS cdv, CV AS cv, CCV AS ccv, MOBILE_NUMBER AS mobileNumber, MEMBER_INFO AS memberInfo, REG_DATE AS regDate, MANAGER_YN AS managerYn, WITHDRAW_YN AS withdrawYn, WITHDRAW_CODE AS withdrawCode, PERSONAL_INFO_YN AS personalInfoYn, PERSONAL_INFO_REG_DATE AS personalInfoRegDate FROM MEMBER_ WHERE NICK_NAME = #{nickName}; /* 닉네임 중복확인 */
